DOC.brief_summary: The intention trial evaluate safety efficacy combination treatment EndoTAG-1 Gemcitabine versus Gemcitabine monotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: EndoTAG-1 / Gemcitabine Combination Therapy Treat Locally Advanced and/or Metastatic Adenocarcinoma Pancreas
DOC.criteria: Inoperable adenocarcinoma pancreas Histologic cytologic confirmation At least 18 year age Any chemotherapeutical treatment pancreatic adenocarcinoma enrollment Major surgery within 4 week prior enrollment Major cardiovascular disease
